stockmarketsim

Class MarketSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarketsim.MarketSnapshot

  • public class MarketSnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a snapshot of the data in the market at a specific time

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MarketSnapshot generateFromStockMarket(StockMarket market, java.util.Date dateTime)
      Generates a snapshot of the current state of a market
      java.lang.String[] getClientNames()
      Gets an array of the client names
      java.lang.Integer[] getClientValues()
      Gets an array of the net worth of each client at the snapshot time, indexed the same as the client names
      java.lang.String[] getCompanyNames()
      Gets an array of the company names
      java.lang.Integer[] getCompanyValues()
      Gets the evaluation of each company at the snapshot time, indexed the same as company names.
      java.util.Date getDate()
      Gets the date the snapshot was taken at
      java.lang.Integer[] getExchangeIndicies()
      Gets an array of indices for the exchanges, indexed the same as the exchange names
      java.lang.String[] getExchangeNames()
      Gets an array of the exchange names (type of company they serve)
      MarketState getMarketState()
      Gets the state of the market at the point the snapshot was taken

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Gets the date the snapshot was taken at

        A date representing when the snapshot was taken

        public MarketState getMarketState()
        Gets the state of the market at the point the snapshot was taken
        Returns:

      • getCompanyValues

        public java.lang.Integer[] getCompanyValues()
        Gets the evaluation of each company at the snapshot time, indexed the same as company names.
        Returns:
        An array of company values in pennies

      • getClientNames

        public java.lang.String[] getClientNames()
        Gets an array of the client names
        Returns:

        public java.lang.Integer[] getClientValues()

        Returns:

      • getExchangeNames

        public java.lang.String[] getExchangeNames()
        Gets an array of the exchange names (type of company they serve)
        Returns:
        An array for the exchange names

      • getExchangeIndicies

        public java.lang.Integer[] getExchangeIndicies()
        Gets an array of indices for the exchanges, indexed the same as the exchange names
        Returns:
        An array for each index of each exchange, in pennies

      • generateFromStockMarket

        public static MarketSnapshot generateFromStockMarket(StockMarket market,
                                                     java.util.Date dateTime)
        Generates a snapshot of the current state of a market
        Parameters:
        market - The market to take a snapshot of
        dateTime - The date and time to assign to the snapshot
        Returns:
        A snapshot of the given market at the current simulation time
